Name: Northland Heroes - The missing druid
About the game: The druid Farandi was kidnapped by dangerous trolls and his tracks are lost in the depths of the forest ... Follow the brave warrior Alva and her brave Vikings into the unknown, through forests, snowy landscapes, dark caves and swamps. Will it be possible to find and free the lost druid? Solve tricky tasks and play exciting levels in this magical click management adventure! Features: - Click management with many challenging levels - No time limit mode for a relaxed gaming experience - Viking adventures in forests and caves, snow and ice landscapes, swamp, volcano and mountain landscapes - Trophies and Awards - Challenging, entertaining gaming fun
